mapper.select: select t.id, t.cover, t.times, t.activity_desc_cms_id, t.activity_name, t.activity_date, b.id as cms_id from activity t left join cms_content b on t.info_express_cms_id=b.id where t.id=#{id} and t.is_deleted=0 and t.status=1

select IFNULL(sum(a.clicks),0) from activity t left join activity_video_chain v on v.activity_id=t.id left join cms_content c on c.id=t.info_express_cms_id left join activity_video a on a.id=v.activity_video_id where t.id=#{id} and a.is_deleted=0 order by a.gmt_create desc

select a.path, a.clicks, a.cover, a.title, a.id from activity t left join activity_video_chain v on v.activity_id=t.id left join cms_content c on c.id=t.info_express_cms_id left join activity_video a on a.id=v.activity_video_id where t.id=#{id} and a.is_deleted=0 order by a.gmt_create desc limit ${startrow},${endrow}

select count(*) from( select a.path, a.clicks, a.cover from activity t left join activity_video_chain v on v.activity_id=t.id left join cms_content c on c.id=t.info_express_cms_id left join activity_video a on a.id=v.activity_video_id where t.id=#{id} and a.is_deleted=0 )r

SELECT a.source_name, a.file_id from activity t left join activity_source_chain b on b.activity_id=t.id left join activity_source a on a.id=b.activity_source_id where t.id=#{id} and a.is_deleted=0 order by a.gmt_upload desc limit ${startrow},10

select count(*) from ( SELECT a.source_name, a.file_id from activity t left join activity_source_chain b on b.activity_id=t.id left join activity_source a on a.id=b.activity_source_id where t.id=#{id} and a.is_deleted=0 )r
mapper.update: update activity_video set clicks=${clicks} where id=#{id}
update activity set times = ${times} where id=#{id}
mapper.select: select t.id,t.activity_name,t.cover,t.activity_desc_cms_id,t.activity_date,t.times from activity t left join cms_content b on b.id = t.info_express_cms_id where t.info_express_cms_id=b.id and b.category_id=2 and t.is_deleted=0 and t.status=1 order by t.is_set_top desc,t.gmt_set_top desc,t.gmt_create desc limit ${startrow},10

select t.activity_name , t.cover, t.id as activity_id, t.activity_desc_cms_id, t.activity_date, b.id from activity t left join material m on m.id=t.material_id left join cms_content b on b.material_id=t.material_id where b.material_id=#{material_id} limit ${start},10
